meanings.definition: To surpass in firing or shooting.
meanings.sent1: During the competition, Sarah managed to outfiring all her opponents.
meanings.sent2: The skilled archer was outfiring all the other contestants at the tournament.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was outfiring all the other animals in the forest with its accurate acorn throws.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was outfiring any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The sun was outfiring all the stars in the sky with its bright light.

meanings.definition: To exceed in performance or achievement.
meanings.sent1: The student was outfiring his classmates in the math competition.
meanings.sent2: The team's hard work paid off, outfiring their previous record.
meanings.sent3: The little ant was outfiring its fellow ants in carrying food back to the nest.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was outfiring any negativity around her.
meanings.sent5: The flower was outfiring all the others in the garden with its vibrant colors.
